Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24531 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.21.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-24531 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.21.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is greater than 1.23.0, affected by CVE-2023-24531
